Research_direction: 昆虫分类学、昆虫形态学、森林昆虫学
Achievements:
代表性论文：1. Cuiqing Gao, M. B. Malipatil. 2019. Meschia zoui sp. nov., first representative of the family Meschiidae from China (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Lygaeoidea). Zootaxa, 4603 (1): 172–182.
2. Cuiqing Gao, M. B. Malipatil. 2019. Revision of the genus Sadoletus Distant, with description of new species from China and Australia (Hemiptera: Heteroptera:Heterogastridae). Zootaxa, 4613 (2): 251–289.
3.Cuiqing Gao, Dávid Rédei, Xueqin Shi, Bo Cai, Ke Liang, Shuo Gao, Wenjun Bu. 2017. A comparative study of the abdominal trichobothria of Trichophora, with emphasis on Lygaeoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera). European Journal of Entomology,114: 587-602.
4.Cuiqing Gao, Dávid Rédei. 2017. The identity of Equatobursa, with proposal of new genus and species level synonymies (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Heterogastridae). Zootaxa, 4237(2): 300-306.
5. Cuiqing Gao, Előd Kondorosy & Wenjun Bu. 2013. A review of the genus Arocatus from Palaearctic and Oriental Regions (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Lygaeidae). The Raffles Bulletin of Zoology, 61(2): 687-704.
6.Cuiqing Gao, Előd Kondorosy & Wenjun Bu. 2012. A new synonym of Acompus rufipes (wolff) (Heteroptera, Lygaeoidea, Rhyparochromidae). Entomotaxonomia, 34(4): 609-612.
7. Cuiqing Gao, Wenjun Bu. 2011. A new record genus, Metopoplax Fieber from China (Heteroptera, Lygaeoidea, Oxycarenidae). Acta Zootaxonomica Sinica, 36(4): 1006-1008.
8. Cuiqing Gao, Kai Dang & Wenjun Bu. 2011. First record of Aradacrates Slater and Wilcox (Heteroptera: Lygaeoidea: Blissidae) in China, with description of one new species. Entomotaxonomia, 33(3): 195-201.
9. Cuiqing Gao, Wenjun Bu. 2010. A review of the Macropes Motschulsky (Hemiptera: Lygaeoidea: Blissidae) from China, with description of three new species. Zootaxa, 2366: 55-68.
10.Cuiqing Gao, Wenjun Bu. 2009. Notes on fine structures of Chauliops with descriptions of two new species from China (Insecta: Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Malcidae). Zootaxa, 2295: 1-14.
11.Teng Li, Cuiqing Gao, Ying Cui, Qiang Xie, Wenjun Bu. 2013. The complete mitochondrial genome of the stalk-eyed bug Chauliops fallax Scott, and the monophyly of Malcidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera). PLoS ONE 8(2): e55381. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0055381.

Projects:
1、江苏省高等学校自然科学研究重大项目，长蝽总科昆虫高级阶元系统演化关系研究，2019.9-2022.8，主持。2、国家自然科学基金青年基金项目，半翅目毛点类昆虫腹部毛点的超微形态与进化研究，2015.1-2017.12，主持。

5、上海市林业局，上海市林业有害生物普查，2014.1-2016.12，参与。
